event.dialog:
There is a busy man behind the bar, cleaning out mugs with a cloth. He is handsome, with coiffed jet-black hair and chiselled features, contrasting with his beer-stained apron. As you take an available seat, he offers his service.
"What can I get you, sir?" madam?"?" Iyanna sent me Nevermind

dialog.eventText: You walk away from the bartender.
